
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xiaozhi_5638/p/18833841" title="发布于 2025-04-18 14:46">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">100行代码实现Chat2XX（DB/ Web/ KnowledgeBase）</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">这两年基于大模型的应用可谓五花八门，Chat2DB，Chat2Web，Chat2KnowledgeBase，Chat2XXX等等。本质上都是以自然语言作为系统输入，通过各种手段获取额外的上下文信息，然后再交给大模型进行信息聚合，最终输出我们想要的答案。至于最终输出的格式，可以多种多样，比如SQL输出、文本输出、JSON输出（作为后续业务代码的输入）、HTML输出（直接拿到浏览器渲染）等等。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 宋体"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/104032/202504/104032-20250418143603489-1280165859.png" alt=""></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">这类应用软件通常基于一些大模型应用框架开发而成，比如现在比较主流的DIFY、RAGFlow、以及字节的COZE等等。这些框架功能强大，入门门槛较低，有丰富的内置插件，通过简单的配置即可实现一个基于Pipeline的工作流，来完成上面提到的功能。本篇文章介绍一个轻量级的大模型工作流应用框架LangPipe，可以轻松解决下面各种问题：</span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">- text generation（文本生成）&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">- chat &nbsp;with LLM（与LLM对话）</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">- task classification（任务分类）</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">- parameters extraction（关键参数提取）</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">- RAG based on Web Search（基于搜索的RAG）</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">- RAG based on SQL（基于数据库的RAG）</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">- RAG based on Vector（基于知识库的RAG）</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">- Chat to DB （数据库对话）</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">- Chat to Web （网页对话）</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">- Chat to Knowledge Base（知识库对话）</span></li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-size: 18px"><strong><span style="font-family: Calibri">LangPipe</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">仓库地址</span></strong></span></p>
<p><a href="https://github.com/sherlockchou86/PyLangPipe" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="text-decoration: underline">https://github.com/sherlockchou86/PyLangPipe</span></a></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-size: 18px"><strong>环境准备</strong></span></p>
<p>&gt; tested on Ubuntu 18.04/20.04/22.04 with 4*RTX 4080 GPUs.</p>
<p><strong>1. <span style="font-family: 宋体">安装</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">Ollama</span></strong></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">1</span> # pull LLMs used by test scripts <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">in</span> tests/
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">2</span> ollama pull minicpm-v:8b  # support text &amp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> image input
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">3</span> ollama pull qwen2.<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">5</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">:7b    # support text only
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">4</span> other LLMs you want to use...</pre>
</div>
<p><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体">2.安装</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">LangPipe</span></strong></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">1</span> git clone https:<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">github.com/sherlockchou86/PyLangPipe.git</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">2</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">cd PyLangPipe
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">3</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">4</span> conda create -n pylangpipe python=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">3.12</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">5</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">conda activate pylangpipe
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">6</span> pip <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">install</span> -<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">r requirements.txt
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">7</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">8</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">python setup.py sdist bdist_wheel
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">9</span> pip <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">install</span> .</pre>
</div>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-size: 18px"><strong>快速开始</strong></span></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 1</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">import</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> langpipe
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 2</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">import</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> sample_nodes
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 3</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 4</span> query = <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"""</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 5</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">腾讯今日的股价行情?
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 6</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"""</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 7</span> query2 = <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"""</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 8</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">写一篇有关暴力的校园短篇小说。
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 9</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"""</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">10</span> query3 = <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"""</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">11</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">小米汽车高速撞车重大事故的详细经过是怎样的？该事件对小米影响如何
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">12</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"""</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">13</span> query4 = <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"""</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">14</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">如何治疗反流性食管炎
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">15</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"""</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">16</span> query5 = <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"""</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">17</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">周杰伦是谁，在华语乐坛有什么成就？
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">18</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"""</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">19</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">20</span> labels_desc =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">21</span>     <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">正常问题</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>: <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">非敏感问题，都归属于正常问题</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">22</span>     <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">敏感问题</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>: <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">一切涉及政治、色情、歧视、暴恐等违法内容的问题</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">23</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">}
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">24</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">25</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">#</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> create nodes</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">26</span> begin = langpipe.LPBegin(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">begin_node</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">27</span> classifier = langpipe.LPClassifier(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">classifier</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">, labels_desc)
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">28</span> bocha_search = sample_nodes.LPBoChaSearch(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">bocha_search</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">sk-***</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>) <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">#</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> replace with your own api key</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">29</span> aggregator = langpipe.LPSuperAggregator(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">aggregator</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, None, True, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">qwen2.5:7b</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>)  <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">#</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> including reference sources</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">30</span> end0 = langpipe.LPEnd(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">end_node_0</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>)  <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">#</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 正常问题 结束分支</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">31</span> end1 = langpipe.LPEnd(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">end_node_1</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>)  <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">#</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 敏感问题 结束分支</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">32</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">33</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">#</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> link together</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">34</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">begin.link(classifier)
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">35</span> classifier.link([bocha_search, end1]) <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">#</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> split into 2 branches automatically</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">36</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">bocha_search.link(aggregator)
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">37</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">aggregator.link([end0])
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">38</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">39</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">#</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> input what you want to</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">40</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">begin.input(query5, None, False)
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">41</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">42</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">#</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> visualize the pipeline with data flow</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">43</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">print</span>(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">-----board for debug purpose-----</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">44</span> renderer = langpipe.LPBoardRender(node_size=100<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">45</span> renderer.render(begin)</pre>
</div>
<p><strong>管道显示：</strong></p>
<p><strong><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/104032/202504/104032-20250418143751218-487900246.png" alt=""></strong></p>
<p><strong><span style="font-family: Calibri">HTML</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">输出（浏览器渲染效果）：</span></strong></p>
<p><strong><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/104032/202504/104032-20250418143815040-1912656613.png" alt=""></strong></p>
<p><strong>控制台输出：</strong></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;[output][final_out <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">from</span> end_node_0]&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
{
    </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">content</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>: <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">周杰伦，1979年1月18日出生于中国台湾省新北市，祖籍福建省永春县。他是一位华语流行乐男歌手、音乐人、演员、导演和编剧。自出道以来，周杰伦凭借其独特的音乐风格和才华横溢的创作能力，在华语乐坛取得了显著成就。\n\n2000年发行首张个人专辑《Jay》，该专辑融合了R&amp;B、Hip-Hop等多种音乐风格，并且其中主打歌曲《星晴》获得了第24届十大中文金曲优秀国语歌曲金奖。这张专辑不仅让周杰伦一战成名，还带动了华语R&amp;B、嘻哈和中国风的流行&lt;a href=\"https://baike.baidu.com/item/%E5%91%A8%E6%9D%B0%E4%BC%A6/129156\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;[1]&lt;/a&gt;。\n\n2001年发行的专辑《范特西》奠定了他融合中西方音乐的风格，并且凭借该专辑获得了第15届台湾金曲奖最佳流行音乐演唱专辑奖。同年，周杰伦还成为美国《时代》杂志封面人物&lt;a href=\"https://vebaike.com/doc-view-1270.html\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;[2]&lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=\"http://1zhr9wp4.shshilin.com/mobile/news/show-323436.html\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;[3]&lt;/a&gt;。\n\n2004年发行的专辑《七里香》在全亚洲首月销量达300万张，并且获得了世界音乐大奖中国区最畅销艺人奖&lt;a href=\"https://baike.baidu.com/item/%E5%91%A8%E6%9D%B0%E4%BC%A6/129156\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;[1]&lt;/a&gt;。此外，他还主演了个人首部电影《头文字D》，凭借该片获得了第25届香港电影金像奖和第42届台湾电影金马奖的最佳新演员奖&lt;a href=\"https://vebaike.com/doc-view-1270.html\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;[2]&lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=\"http://1zhr9wp4.shshilin.com/mobile/news/show-323436.html\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;[3]&lt;/a&gt;。\n\n从2006年起连续三年获得世界音乐大奖中国区最畅销艺人奖。2017年，周杰伦监制的爱情冒险电影《一万公里的约定》上映，并担任明星经理人的综艺节目《这！就是灌篮》的导师&lt;a href=\"https://piaofang.maoyan.com/celebrity?id=28427\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;[4]&lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://baijiahao.baidu.com/s?id=1820484479709473213\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;[5]&lt;/a&gt;。\n\n周杰伦不仅在音乐上取得了巨大成功，在商业和设计领域也有涉足。他于2007年成立了杰威尔有限公司，同年还担任了华硕笔电设计师，并入股香港文化传信集团&lt;a href=\"https://music.apple.com/cn/playlist/%E5%91%A8%E6%9D%B0%E4%BC%A6%E5%86%99%E7%9A%84%E6%AD%8C/pl.5a3e20295f804b298e507226f335e567\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;[6]&lt;/a&gt;。\n\n此外，周杰伦热心公益慈善事业，多次向中国内地灾区捐款捐物，如在2008年捐款援建希望小学。他还曾担任中国禁毒宣传形象大使&lt;a href=\"https://baijiahao.baidu.com/s?id=1820484479709473213\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;[5]&lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://www.mingrenw.cn/ziliao/3/2970.html\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;[7]&lt;/a&gt;。\n\n综上所述，周杰伦是华语乐坛独一无二的存在，他的音乐陪伴了许多人的青春，并且他凭借多方面的才华和成就，在全球范围内都享有极高的声誉&lt;a href=\"https://baike.baidu.com/item/%E5%91%A8%E6%9D%B0%E4%BC%A6/129156\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;[1]&lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://vebaike.com/doc-view-1270.html\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;[2]&lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=\"http://1zhr9wp4.shshilin.com/mobile/news/show-323436.html\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;[3]&lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://piaofang.maoyan.com/celebrity?id=28427\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;[4]&lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://baijiahao.baidu.com/s?id=1820484479709473213\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;[5]&lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://music.apple.com/cn/playlist/%E5%91%A8%E6%9D%B0%E4%BC%A6%E5%86%99%E7%9A%84%E6%AD%8C/pl.5a3e20295f804b298e507226f335e567\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;[6]&lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://www.mingrenw.cn/ziliao/3/2970.html\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;[7]&lt;/a&gt;。</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">references</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">: [
        </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">https://baike.baidu.com/item/%E5%91%A8%E6%9D%B0%E4%BC%A6/129156</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
        </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">https://vebaike.com/doc-view-1270.html</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
        </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">http://1zhr9wp4.shshilin.com/mobile/news/show-323436.html</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
        </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">https://piaofang.maoyan.com/celebrity?id=28427</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
        </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">https://baijiahao.baidu.com/s?id=1820484479709473213</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
        </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">https://music.apple.com/cn/playlist/%E5%91%A8%E6%9D%B0%E4%BC%A6%E5%86%99%E7%9A%84%E6%AD%8C/pl.5a3e20295f804b298e507226f335e567</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
        </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">https://www.mingrenw.cn/ziliao/3/2970.html</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
    ]
}
</span>&lt;&lt;&lt;&lt;&lt;&lt;&lt;&lt;&lt;&lt;&lt;&lt;&lt;[output][final_out <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">from</span> end_node_0]&lt;&lt;&lt;&lt;&lt;&lt;&lt;&lt;&lt;&lt;&lt;&lt;&lt;</pre>
</div>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
